body: Hi guys, this is the message I get when trying to run simulations on files I've been developing the past 4-5 weeks. I had no problems with them previously, haven't used them for 1 week and tried to run them again but just get this message each time. I haven't changed the files since I last used them. Stumped. Just re-uploaded simplified files which give same error message. Can you help? Cheers, Rob
topic: 1. Solution exception:global name 'HBGenerators_' is not defined
